    • Method Detail

      • findFirstControl

        public static <T extends com.jme3.scene.control.Control> T findFirstControl(com.jme3.scene.Spatial spatial,
                                                                            java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Perform a depthfirst traversal of the spatial to locate the first control of the given type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the control
        Parameters:
        spatial - the scene graph to traverse
        type - the class of the control
        Returns:
        the first control that matches the given class, or null if no control is found.

      • getFirstControl

        public static <T extends com.jme3.scene.control.Control> java.util.Optional<T> getFirstControl(com.jme3.scene.Spatial spatial,
                                                                                               java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Perform a depthfirst traversal of the spatial to locate the first control of the given type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the control
        Parameters:
        spatial - the scene graph to traverse
        type - the class of the control
        Returns:
        the first control that matches the given class wrapped in an Optional, or an empty Optional

      • findFirstGeometry

        public static com.jme3.scene.Geometry findFirstGeometry(com.jme3.scene.Spatial spatial)
        Perform a depthfirst traversal of the spatial, to locate the first geometry.
        Parameters:
        spatial - : the scene graph to traverse
        Returns:
        the first geometry, or null if no geometry is found.

      • getFirstGeometry

        public static java.util.Optional<com.jme3.scene.Geometry> getFirstGeometry(com.jme3.scene.Spatial spatial)
        Perform a depthfirst traversal of the spatial, to locate the first geometry.
        Parameters:
        spatial - the scene graph to traverse
        Returns:
        the first geometry wrapped in an Optional or an empty Optional

      • printTreeStructure

        public static java.lang.String printTreeStructure(com.jme3.scene.Spatial spatial)
        Perform a breadthfirst traversal of the spatial and return the spatial structure as a string representation.
        Parameters:
        spatial - the spatial to traverse
        Returns:
        string representation of the spatial structure

      • printTreeStructure

        public static java.lang.String printTreeStructure(com.jme3.scene.Spatial spatial,
                                                  java.lang.StringBuilder sb,
                                                  java.lang.String indent,
                                                  java.lang.String indentString)
        Perform a breadthfirst traversal of the spatial and return the spatial structure as a string representation.
        Parameters:
        spatial - the spatial to traverse
        sb - the stringbuilder that gets appended
        indent - the indent to put in front of each new line
        indentString - the actual characters that will be used to visualize the indent
        Returns:
        string representation of the spatial structure
